turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to get a pizza order going at Bella Luna. Can you help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm I want to get three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, on the first one I want anchovy and onions, and then on the second one I want garlic and bell pepper and the last one I want ground beef and then make that one with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 3 large pizzas, one anchovie and onions, one garlic and bell pepper, one ground beef with extra cheese for a total of $60.99.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I want them with thin crust too. And also, what did you say the was on you had down for the first one? I didn't understand.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and your total with thin crust is $61.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and you'll get the reciept via text!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, have a great day, bye.
